name: Tatil
description:
For a better experience, it's recommended to play the downloadable version using a Xbox ONE Controller. The rumble feature will indicate to you how close you are from an explosive area.

Guide a robot on a mission to extract soil samples from a new planet, but be careful, as the terrain is known for being explosive. Check the oscillometer to avoid having the robot destroyed.

Controls for Keyboards

  • A/D -> Rotate Robot
  • W -> Move Forward
  • S -> Move Backward
  • Q -> Exit Gameplay

Controls for Xbox Controller

  • Left Analog (left and right) -> Rotate Robot
  • X button -> Move Forward
  • A button -> Move Backward
  • B button -> Exit Gameplay
